metadata.apollo_status: API key NOT configured on Railway. Set APOLLO_API_KEY env var to enable automated enrichment.
metadata.enrichment_method: Web research: property websites, hospital system websites, corporate directories, management company identification
metadata.instructions: Use POST /api/prospects/:id/contacts with each enriched contact to push to CRM. Verify phone numbers before cold calling.

enriched_prospects.name: The Rays at Vegas Towers
enriched_prospects.address: 1061 E Flamingo Rd, Las Vegas, NV 89119

enrichment.decision_maker_approach: Corp number suggests managed by a company. Pop in and ask front desk for the Property Manager name. Likely local management company.

enriched_prospects.name: High Line at Hughes Center Apartments
enriched_prospects.address: 3776 Howard Hughes Pkwy, Las Vegas, NV 89169

enrichment.decision_maker_approach: Hughes Center is a premium corporate area. Likely managed by institutional PM company. Ask leasing office for Community Manager by name. Cushman & Wakefield manages several properties in this area.

enriched_prospects.name: Park Towers At Hughes Center
enriched_prospects.address: 1 Hughes Center Dr, Las Vegas, NV 89169
enriched_prospects.management_company: Park Towers HOA / First Service Residential
enriched_prospects.existing_notes: Spoke with Joey, PM will be in Monday

enrichment.contact_title: Property Manager (ask Joey for PM name)
enrichment.decision_maker_approach: WARM - already spoke with Joey. Follow up Monday as instructed. Get PM's full name and email. Condo tower = HOA board approval likely needed. Ask PM about upcoming board meetings.

enriched_prospects.name: Ainsley at The Collective
enriched_prospects.address: 3930 Paradise Rd, Las Vegas, NV 89169
enriched_prospects.parent_org: Elysian Living LLC (local Las Vegas operator, 9 Nevada properties)
enriched_prospects.existing_notes: Not able to make contact with front desk, will pop in visit on tuesday due to holiday

enrichment.decision_maker_approach: KEY RELATIONSHIP: Elysian Living manages 9 properties in LV/Henderson (verified via elysianliving.com). Getting in here = door to 8 more properties. Ask for Regional Property Manager. Other Elysian properties: The Palms, Skye Canyon, Rainbow, Fort Apache, Tivoli, Fremont, The District (Henderson), Homes at Cadence (Henderson).

missing_from_crm: Elysian Homes at Cadence - Henderson, NV
Elysian at Skye Canyon - Las Vegas, NV
Elysian at Rainbow - Las Vegas, NV
Ely at Fort Apache - Las Vegas, NV
Elysian at Tivoli - Las Vegas, NV
Ely on Fremont - Las Vegas, NV
Elysian at The District - Henderson, NV

enriched_prospects.name: Three Turnberry Place
enriched_prospects.address: 2747 Paradise Rd, Las Vegas, NV 89109
enriched_prospects.management_company: Turnberry Associates / HOA Management (FirstService Residential likely)
enriched_prospects.existing_notes: Spoke with Nina, PM will be available on tuesday

enrichment.decision_maker_approach: WARM - Nina confirmed PM available Tuesday. Three Turnberry, Four Turnberry, and Turnberry Towers are all related properties (same developer). Get PM name from Nina, then pitch all 3 Turnberry properties as a bundle.

enriched_prospects.name: Four Turnberry Place
enriched_prospects.address: 2777 Paradise Rd UNIT 2203, Las Vegas, NV 89109
enriched_prospects.existing_notes: Spoke with Lisa, PM will be available tuesday morning (Suggested to call again)

enrichment.decision_maker_approach: WARM - Lisa suggested calling back Tuesday morning. May share PM with Three Turnberry Place. Luxury condo = HOA board decision. Pitch premium healthy vending.

enriched_prospects.name: Turnberry Towers Las Vegas
enriched_prospects.address: 322 E Karen Ave, Las Vegas, NV 89109
enriched_prospects.existing_notes: No answer, will pop in tuesday.

enrichment.decision_maker_approach: Third Turnberry property. If you connect with PM at Three or Four Turnberry, ask about Turnberry Towers as well. Same developer family.

enriched_prospects.name: Country Club Towers
enriched_prospects.address: 850 E Desert Inn Rd, Las Vegas, NV 89109

enrichment.decision_maker_approach: Condo tower near Las Vegas Country Club. HOA-managed. Need to reach Building Manager. Try calling and asking for management office. Decision goes through HOA board.

enriched_prospects.name: Sky Tower Las Vegas Condominiums
enriched_prospects.address: 2700 S Las Vegas Blvd, Las Vegas, NV 89109
enriched_prospects.existing_notes: Tried to pop in, office was closed, will call again monday MLK day. Planned pop in Tuesday

enrichment.decision_maker_approach: On the Strip - luxury condos. Follow up on the planned Tuesday pop-in. High-end = premium vending products only.

enriched_prospects.name: Green Leaf Lotus
enriched_prospects.address: 3463 Procyon St, Las Vegas, NV 89102

enrichment.decision_maker_approach: Smaller apartment complex. Local management = faster decisions. Call and ask for PM by name.

enriched_prospects.name: Elysian at The Palms
enriched_prospects.address: 3850 W Nevso Dr, Las Vegas, NV 89103
enriched_prospects.existing_notes: Corp number listed, closed on MLK day, will do pop in visit on tuesday. Attempted to speak with Manager

enrichment.decision_maker_approach: ELYSIAN PORTFOLIO PLAY - Second Elysian property. Verified via elysianliving.com. Connect this pitch with Ainsley at The Collective (ID 15). If you get Regional PM, pitch all 9 properties. Mentions Hugh Hefner-themed wallpaper in marketing = trendy/upscale positioning.

enriched_prospects.name: Veer Towers
enriched_prospects.address: 3722 & 3726 S Las Vegas Blvd, Las Vegas, NV 89158

enrichment.decision_maker_approach: MEGA TARGET - Part of CityCenter (MGM Resorts). Two 37-story towers, 670 residences. Ultra-luxury. MGM corporate will likely control vending contracts. Try to reach Building Manager for local placement. Premium products only.

enriched_prospects.name: Auric Symphony Park
enriched_prospects.address: 250 Promenade Pl, Las Vegas, NV 89106

enrichment.decision_maker_approach: Greystar-managed luxury apartments in Symphony Park/Downtown. Greystar manages multiple LV properties. Regional Property Manager decision. Modern building with fitness center, pool = ideal vending locations.

enriched_prospects.name: Maverick Las Vegas
enriched_prospects.address: 7880 W Maule Ave, Las Vegas, NV 89113
enriched_prospects.existing_notes: Luxury and active/ Large apartment layout

enrichment.decision_maker_approach: Notes say 'Luxury and active / Large apartment layout' = high unit count. Southwest LV near UnCommons. Western National Group is a major developer. Premium vending with healthy options.

enriched_prospects.name: NRI Distribution Center
enriched_prospects.address: 3591 Volunteer Blvd, Henderson, NV 89044
enriched_prospects.existing_notes: Could not gain access to building. Tried to buzz in through front door, but no answer.

enrichment.decision_maker_approach: Warehouse = break room vending. Could not access building last visit. Try calling main line, ask for Facility Manager or HR department. Warehouses often have vending in break rooms for shift workers. High volume during lunch/break times.

enriched_prospects.name: Amazon Warehouse (LAS2/LAS7)
enriched_prospects.address: 12300 Bermuda Rd, Henderson, NV 89044
enriched_prospects.existing_notes: Was not receptive to solicitation, was told to return back to speak with manager because he was busy

enrichment.decision_maker_approach: TOUGH BUT MASSIVE - Amazon fulfillment centers typically have existing national vending contracts (Aramark, Canteen). However, they also have Amazon Go/Just Walk Out micro-markets. Worth following up with Site Manager. Ask for Area Manager or GM. 1000+ employees = huge break room traffic.

enriched_prospects.name: Amazon Warehouse2
enriched_prospects.address: 1500 Bermuda Rd, Henderson, NV 89052

enrichment.decision_maker_approach: Second Amazon facility. If you get in at one Amazon location, can potentially leverage for others. Same corporate structure. Try LinkedIn for 'Amazon Area Manager Henderson NV'.

enriched_prospects.name: DB Schenker
enriched_prospects.address: 12020 Bermuda Rd, Henderson, NV 89052

enrichment.decision_maker_approach: German logistics company. Corporate procurement may control vending. Try reaching local Branch Manager. Look up on LinkedIn: 'DB Schenker Henderson NV Manager'.

enriched_prospects.name: Levi Strauss & Co. (Sky Harbor)
enriched_prospects.address: 501 Executive Airport Dr, Henderson, NV

enrichment.decision_maker_approach: NOTE: CRM has separate 'Levis' entry (ID 83) with contact FLOR ESPINO-JIMENEZ. This may be the same facility or a related one. Cross-reference with ID 83 and use existing contact to approach this location.

enriched_prospects.name: Aces HQ (Las Vegas Aces)
enriched_prospects.address: 1415 Raiders Way, Henderson, NV 89052

enrichment.decision_maker_approach: WNBA team headquarters. Small but prestigious account. MGM Resorts owns the Aces. Try calling main office and ask for Facility or Office Manager. Could also connect via Raiders Way business park relationships.

enriched_prospects.name: Desert Radiology
enriched_prospects.address: 2811 W Horizon Ridge Pkwy, Henderson, NV 89052

enrichment.decision_maker_approach: Medical imaging center. Staff break room vending. Part of Radiology Partners (national group) - corporate may control. Target local Office Manager. Desert Radiology has multiple Southern Nevada locations = portfolio play.

enriched_prospects.name: Steinberg Diagnostic
enriched_prospects.address: 4 Sunset Way Building D, Henderson, NV 89014

enrichment.decision_maker_approach: Local diagnostic imaging group with multiple LV locations. Founded by Dr. Mark Steinberg. Target Office Manager at this location. Steinberg has ~10 locations across Las Vegas = portfolio opportunity.

enriched_prospects.name: Dignity Health (St. Rose Dominican - Siena)
enriched_prospects.address: 3001 St Rose Pkwy, Henderson, NV 89052
enriched_prospects.parent_org: CommonSpirit Health (nation's largest nonprofit health system)

enrichment.contact_title: Director of Facilities / VP of Support Services
enrichment.decision_maker_approach: VERIFIED via dignityhealth.org. St. Rose Dominican has 3 campuses (Siena, Rose de Lima, San Martin). CommonSpirit Health is massive = likely national vending contracts. Target local Director of Facilities for supplemental placement. Ask about break room and waiting area vending.

enriched_prospects.name: West Henderson Hospital
enriched_prospects.address: 1155 Raiders Way, Henderson, NV 89052

enrichment.decision_maker_approach: VERIFIED via valleyhealthsystemlv.com. Opened Dec 3, 2024 = BRAND NEW. 150 beds, 36-bay ER. Newest hospital in the valley. New facility = vending not yet established! URGENT: contact Director of Facilities ASAP before competitor locks in contract. Valley Health System has 7 hospitals + 7 freestanding ERs.

enriched_prospects.name: The Grandview
enriched_prospects.address: 9940 S Las Vegas Blvd, Las Vegas, NV 89183
enriched_prospects.management_company: The Grandview at Las Vegas / Hilton Grand Vacations

enrichment.decision_maker_approach: Timeshare resort = high guest turnover, constant demand. Hilton Grand Vacations corporate may control vending. Target local Resort Manager. Guest areas, pool, lobby, and laundry rooms are prime vending locations.

enriched_prospects.name: Arriva
enriched_prospects.address: 11055 Las Vegas Blvd S, Las Vegas, NV 89183
enriched_prospects.management_company: TBD - New construction in Southern Highlands area

enrichment.decision_maker_approach: New apartment community on S Las Vegas Blvd near Inspirada. Pop in for leasing office visit. New construction = no existing vending contract = first mover advantage.

enriched_prospects.name: Marlowe
enriched_prospects.address: 11210 S Las Vegas Blvd, Las Vegas, NV 89183

enrichment.decision_maker_approach: Adjacent to Arriva (ID 103) on S Las Vegas Blvd. Pitch both properties in same trip. New construction area.

enriched_prospects.name: Unknown Facility (needs ID)
enriched_prospects.existing_notes: Warm lead. Spoke with facility manager, current contract expiring soon. Has mini mart self-serve section.

enrichment.decision_maker_approach: HOT LEAD - Current vending contract expiring soon! Has mini mart section = understands vending. PRIORITY: Identify this facility ASAP. Check call logs, GPS history, or ask the sales rep who entered this. This could be the fastest close in the pipeline.

enriched_prospects.name: Smiths Warehouse (Kroger Distribution)
enriched_prospects.address: 1775 Raiders Way, Henderson, NV 89052

enrichment.decision_maker_approach: Kroger subsidiary. Corporate procurement likely controls. Also have Kroger DC at 13000 N Las Vegas Blvd (CRM ID 157). Try local Warehouse Manager first. Kroger is a grocery company so they understand food/beverage retail.

enriched_prospects.name: Cactus Valley Retirement Home
enriched_prospects.address: 11088 Amigo St, Henderson, NV 89052

enrichment.decision_maker_approach: Small independent retirement home. Local decision maker = fast sales cycle. Administrator decides. Senior residents on-site 24/7 = consistent vending demand. Easy-access machines important.

enriched_prospects.name: Intermountain Healthcare
enriched_prospects.address: 2825 Siena Heights Dr Suite 102, Henderson, NV 89052
enriched_prospects.existing_notes: Offices do not have a building manager. Was directed to Southwest Medical. Has vending on site.

enrichment.contact_title: Regional Operations Director / Facility Manager at Southwest Medical
enrichment.decision_maker_approach: EXISTING VENDING ON SITE = replacement/upgrade opportunity. Notes say directed to Southwest Medical (Intermountain subsidiary). Intermountain is a massive health system. Target Southwest Medical's facility management team. This is the entry point for all Intermountain locations in LV.

enriched_prospects.name: CareNow Urgent Care
enriched_prospects.address: 10652 S Eastern Ave, Henderson, NV 89052

enrichment.decision_maker_approach: CareNow is owned by HCA Healthcare. Multiple locations in LV area. Small individual clinics but corporate deal could cover all locations. HCA also operates Sunrise Hospital, MountainView Hospital, Southern Hills Hospital.

enriched_prospects.name: Elite Rapid Care
enriched_prospects.address: 2960 Sunridge Heights Pkwy Suite 100, Henderson, NV 89052

enrichment.decision_maker_approach: Independent urgent care. Small staff but decision maker is the owner/office manager. Quick decision cycle. Staff break room placement.

enriched_prospects.name: CareNow Urgent Care 2
enriched_prospects.address: 9785 S Maryland Pkwy Suite A-2, Las Vegas, NV 89183

enrichment.decision_maker_approach: Second CareNow location. Bundle with ID 138. HCA corporate deal could cover all CareNow + hospital locations.

enriched_prospects.name: Horizon Ridge Surgery Center
enriched_prospects.address: 10561 Jeffreys St #130, Henderson, NV 89052
enriched_prospects.parent_org: Possibly affiliated with a surgery center management company
enriched_prospects.existing_notes: Large office, front desk thinks that they are under corporate contract, will call for additional info

enrichment.decision_maker_approach: NOTES SAY: Front desk thinks under corporate contract. Need to verify: is the building under contract or just the surgery center? Ask for Practice Administrator. If corporate contract, find out when it expires.

enriched_prospects.name: Panorama Towers
enriched_prospects.address: 4525 Dean Martin Dr, Las Vegas, NV 89103
enriched_prospects.existing_notes: Need appointment to get past security

enrichment.decision_maker_approach: Two 33-story towers with ~700 units. Luxury condos near CityCenter. NOTES: Need appointment to get past security = gated/concierge building. Call ahead and schedule meeting with Building Manager or HOA Manager. Large building = multiple vending locations (lobby, gym, pool, each floor lounge).

enriched_prospects.name: Las Ventanas at Summerlin
enriched_prospects.address: 10401 W Charleston Blvd, Las Vegas, NV 89135

enrichment.decision_maker_approach: Active adult/senior living in Summerlin. Executive Director makes vending decisions. Residents on-site 24/7. Common areas, community room, near pool = vending locations. Summerlin = affluent area.

enriched_prospects.name: Atria Seville
enriched_prospects.address: 2000 N Rampart Blvd, Las Vegas, NV 89128
enriched_prospects.parent_org: Ventas Inc (NYSE: VTR) - major healthcare REIT

enrichment.decision_maker_approach: Verified via seniorliving.org (4.5 stars). Atria is national brand (200+ communities). Part of Ventas REIT. May have national vending contract. Target local Executive Director. Staff break rooms + common areas for residents.

enriched_prospects.name: Legacy House of Centennial Hills
enriched_prospects.address: 6310 N Durango Dr, Las Vegas, NV 89149
enriched_prospects.parent_org: Legacy House (local Las Vegas chain, multiple locations)

enrichment.decision_maker_approach: Verified via seniorliving.org (4.5 stars). Legacy House has multiple Las Vegas locations (Centennial Hills, Southern Hills). Local chain = local decision maker. Target Executive Director. Bundle both Legacy House locations.

enriched_prospects.name: Oakmont of Las Vegas
enriched_prospects.address: 3185 E Flamingo Rd, Las Vegas, NV 89121

enrichment.decision_maker_approach: Oakmont is a major senior living operator (50+ communities, CA-based). Regional Director may need to approve. Target local Executive Director first. Assisted living + memory care = staff vending needs.

enriched_prospects.name: Avamere at Cheyenne
enriched_prospects.address: 6031 W Cheyenne Ave, Las Vegas, NV 89108

enrichment.decision_maker_approach: Verified via seniorliving.org (4 stars). Avamere is a Pacific NW-based senior living company expanding into Nevada. Local Executive Director decides. Assisted living, independent living, memory care = diverse population. Staff + residents + visitors = vending demand.

enriched_prospects.name: One Queensridge Place
enriched_prospects.address: 9101 Alta Dr, Las Vegas, NV 89145

enrichment.decision_maker_approach: Ultra-luxury condominiums in Summerlin (units sell for $1M-$10M+). Two towers, 219 units. White-glove service. Will need appointment past concierge. Premium products only (sparkling water, organic snacks, fresh food). HOA board decision.

enriched_prospects.name: The Ogden
enriched_prospects.address: 150 N Las Vegas Blvd, Las Vegas, NV 89101
enriched_prospects.management_company: The Ogden HOA / First Service Residential

enrichment.decision_maker_approach: Downtown Las Vegas high-rise. 21 stories, 275 units. Young professionals demographic. Near Fremont East. Modern amenities = good vending locations. HOA managed, likely FirstService Residential.

enriched_prospects.name: Sky Las Vegas
enriched_prospects.address: 2700 Las Vegas Blvd S, Las Vegas, NV 89109

enrichment.decision_maker_approach: 44-story luxury condo tower on the Strip. 409 units. High-end residents + short-term rental guests = diverse vending demand. Call concierge and ask for Building/HOA Manager. Premium products essential.

enriched_prospects.name: Coronado Ridge Skilled Nursing
enriched_prospects.address: 2855 W Horizon Ridge Pkwy, Henderson, NV 89052

enrichment.decision_maker_approach: Skilled nursing facility in Henderson. Staff work 24/7 shifts = break room vending essential. Administrator makes vending decisions. Adjacent to Horizon Ridge medical corridor.

enriched_prospects.name: Canyon Vista Post Acute
enriched_prospects.address: 6352 Medical Center St, Las Vegas, NV 89148

enrichment.decision_maker_approach: Post-acute/rehab facility. Staff working rotating shifts need break room vending. Patient visitors also use vending. Administrator makes decision. Located on Medical Center St = medical corridor.

enriched_prospects.name: Fora
enriched_prospects.address: 10244 Jeffreys St, Las Vegas, NV 89183

enrichment.decision_maker_approach: Newer apartment community near Inspirada/St. Rose area. Pop in to leasing office for management company ID. New properties = no existing vending contracts.

enriched_prospects.name: Kroger (Smith's) Distribution Center
enriched_prospects.address: 13000 N Las Vegas Blvd (Apex Industrial Park)

enrichment.decision_maker_approach: Massive DC in Apex Industrial Park. 500+ employees across shifts. Kroger corporate procurement controls vending. Try local DC Manager or HR for break room machines. Related to Smith's Warehouse (ID 109).

enriched_prospects.name: Hey Dude / Crocs Distribution Center
enriched_prospects.address: 4490 Nexus Way (Northgate/Apex)

enrichment.decision_maker_approach: Crocs acquired Hey Dude in 2022. Distribution center = 200-400 employees. Break room vending for shift workers. Try front desk for Facility/Warehouse Manager. Same address as Fanatics (ID 160) - may share building/complex.

enriched_prospects.name: Poly-West (Poly-America)
enriched_prospects.address: 251 Conestoga Way, Henderson, NV

enrichment.decision_maker_approach: Manufacturing/distribution facility. Plant Manager decides for local facility. Poly-America is a major plastics manufacturer. Workers need break room vending.

enriched_prospects.name: Fanatics Fulfillment Center
enriched_prospects.address: 4490 Nexus Way (Northgate)

enrichment.decision_maker_approach: Major sports merchandise fulfillment. 500+ employees, seasonal surges. High volume break room usage. Same address as Hey Dude (ID 158) - pitch both together. Fanatics is well-funded = can afford premium vending.

enriched_prospects.name: Ocean Spray Cranberries
enriched_prospects.address: 1301 American Pacific Dr, Henderson, NV

enrichment.decision_maker_approach: Food/beverage cooperative. Distribution facility. They understand food/beverage business. Plant Manager for local decision. Interesting angle: offer to stock Ocean Spray products in the vending machines at their own facility.

enriched_prospects.name: Turano Nevada Baking Company
enriched_prospects.address: 490 E Bruner Ave, Henderson, NV

enrichment.decision_maker_approach: Family-owned bakery. Production facility = shift workers needing break room vending. Family company = local Plant Manager can likely make decision faster than corporate chains. Food company = understands quality.

enriched_prospects.name: The Honest Company
enriched_prospects.address: 3400 E Regena Ave (Northgate)
enriched_prospects.parent_org: The Honest Company (NASDAQ: HNST, Jessica Alba)

enrichment.decision_maker_approach: Consumer goods company (baby/personal care). Distribution center. Brand is all about wellness = pitch healthy vending options. Target local Warehouse Manager.

enriched_prospects.name: Air Liquide
enriched_prospects.address: Apex Industrial Park, North Las Vegas, NV

enrichment.decision_maker_approach: French industrial gas company. Smaller site but high-value employees (engineers, technicians). Corporate procurement may control. Try local Site Manager. Specialized industrial facility.

enriched_prospects.name: FedEx Ground
enriched_prospects.address: Sloan Ln / West Henderson Area

enrichment.decision_maker_approach: FedEx Ground hub. 200-400 employees, package handlers work physical shifts = high vending demand. FedEx has national vending contracts (typically Aramark or Canteen). Try local Terminal Manager for supplemental machines in break rooms not covered by existing vendor.

portfolio_opportunities.description: These are management companies controlling multiple properties. One relationship = multiple locations.

tier1_highest_value.approach: Get Regional Property Manager contact. Pitch portfolio deal for all 9 properties.

tier1_highest_value.description: 7 hospitals + 7 freestanding ERs. West Henderson Hospital (ID 91) opened Dec 2024 = NO existing vending contract.
tier1_highest_value.approach: Start with brand-new West Henderson Hospital. Use success there to pitch system-wide.
Nina at Three Turnberry and Lisa at Four Turnberry already contacted. Get PM name, pitch all 3 towers.

tier2_high_value.additional: Also operates Sunrise Hospital, MountainView Hospital, Southern Hills Hospital + CareNow locations
tier2_high_value.approach: CareNow locations are the entry point. HCA regional operations team controls larger decisions.
St. Rose Dominican has 3 campuses. CommonSpirit is massive = likely existing contracts. Target local Director of Facilities.
Two distribution centers. Kroger corporate procurement likely controls. Try local managers first.
Two warehouses. National contracts exist but try for supplemental placement. Site Manager at ID 78 was busy but didn't say no.

tier2_high_value.description: Veer Towers + Aces HQ. MGM is massive = corporate procurement.

net_new_leads_needed.description: Segments with gaps in CRM coverage

gaps.segment: Elysian Living properties NOT in CRM
gaps.action: Add all 7 to CRM immediately. Pitch as bundle with existing Elysian prospects.

properties.name: Spring Valley Hospital
properties.address: 5400 S Rainbow Blvd, Las Vegas, NV 89118

gaps.action: Add to CRM. Pitch as system-wide deal starting from West Henderson Hospital.

gaps.note: Only 1 commercial prospect active (Aces HQ). This is the weakest segment. Need to add office parks, business centers.
gaps.action: Add Hughes Center, Green Valley Corporate Center, Downtown Summerlin office towers to CRM.

hot_leads_priority_list.reason: Current vending contract expiring soon. Spoke with facility manager. Has mini mart. IDENTIFY AND CLOSE THIS ASAP.

hot_leads_priority_list.reason: BRAND NEW hospital (opened Dec 2024). 150 beds. Vending not yet established. First mover wins.

hot_leads_priority_list.reason: Gateway to 9-property portfolio deal with Elysian Living LLC.

hot_leads_priority_list.name: Three Turnberry Place
hot_leads_priority_list.reason: Already spoke with Nina. PM available Tuesday. 3-tower bundle opportunity.
